## Assignment 4<br>BUSI 721: Data-Driven Finance I<br>Rice University

Submit a Jupyter notebook or an Excel workbook that does the following:
Using the income statements and balance sheets for CVX and COP for the past five years and the variables Net Income, Total Revenue, Total Assets, and Stockholders Equity, calculate and plot the four financial ratios (ROE, Net Profit Margin, Asset Turnover, and Equity Multiplier) over time.
